ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 1024
ygData.msgSnippet: i avoid them now, since following experiences with encs and i just ... That s one of the oddest things I ve seen.  Enchanters are awesome alongside bards.
ygData.messageBody:
i avoid them now, since following experiences with encs and i just
> don't mix. imho, i think enc's have a certain personality type that just
> don't mix with bards. hehe
>
> lynnara starspinner
>

That's one of the oddest things I've seen. Enchanters are awesome alongside
bards. Sure you can't use your "Standard" songs but working around an
enchanter's strengths, and enhancing them in some cases, is a good thing. I
find it fun and enjoyable. Enchanters love having me with them and vice
versa. I really don't think there's any "personality type" that's
incompatible with bards. ;)

Yer a bard, be versatile. Thats one of OUR strengths.
